title: Who is Judge Kathryn Kimball Mizelle, the federal judge who blocked Biden's travel mask mandate? - CNN
content:
1. Who is Judge Kathryn Kimball Mizelle, the federal judge who blocked Biden's travel mask mandate?  CNN
  2. Former CDC Director On Judge's Decision To Overturn Travel Mask Mandate  NBC News
  3. Furious liberals revolt after Trump appointed judge lifts mask mandate: 'Idiot airline'  Fox News
  4. Opinion | Judge Kathryn Kimball Mizelle's lifting mask mandate on planes was a legal blunder  The Washington Post
  5. Opinion | Mask ruling shows Trump's toxic judicial legacy is poisoning America  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A little-known federal judge appointed by former President Donald Trump found herself in the national spotlight on Monday after striking down the Biden administration's public transportation mask mandate.
